title: Everything New on Paramount+ in March 2025
body_text:
Wondering what's on Paramount+ in March 2025? Check this list for the full Paramount+ March schedule.
It's a very special month as March marks four years of Paramount+. Since launching in 2021, the streamer is one of the fastest growing streaming services, airing everything from Paramount+ plus original series such as Knuckles and Halo, to live sports events.
Above all, you won't want to miss the highly anticipated original series Happy Face. Based on a true story, it centres on Annaleigh Ashford's Melissa G. Moore who discovers her father, played with chilling intensity by Dennis Quaid, is a serial killer.
In terms of movies, a whole new wave of critically acclaimed releases make their way to Paramount+ in March, including Babylon, Foxcatcher, Inglourious Basterds*, Frozen River, Good Will Hunting, Million Dollar Baby, Mulholland Drive, Pulp Fiction, Serpico, The Hurt Locker, The Ides of March, There Will Be Blood, and Up in the Air.
Sports-wise there's also month-long streaming of the NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Championship games, and the UEFA Champions League round of 16. The below covers all things March 2025 Paramount+, including originals, exclusives, premiers and events.

* Title is available to Paramount+ with SHOWTIME subscribers.
**All Paramount+ with SHOWTIME subscribers can live stream CBS titles via the live feed on Paramount+. Those titles will be available on-demand to all subscribers the day after they air live.
Dates for library titles are subject to change. Paramount+ Premium subscribers will have access to CBS titles to stream live via the live feed of their local CBS affiliate on the service as well as on-demand. Essential tier subscribers have access to these titles on-demand the day after they air.
